coffee.name: Frappé coffee
coffee.description: Our frappé coffee, Greek frappé is a Greek iced coffee drink made from pure columbian coffee, water, sugar, and milk.

coffee.name: Cappuccino
coffee.description: Our appuccino is an espresso-based coffee drink that originated in Italy, and is prepared with steamed milk foam with a hint of almond milk and vanilla extract . You can specify a design to our barrista if you wish.

coffee.name: dalgona
coffee.description: Our Dalgona coffee is a beverage made by whipping Italian coffee with sugar, and hot water until it becomes creamy and then adding it a hint of chocolate and some Marshmallow .

coffee.name: Americano
coffee.description: Caffè Americano is a type of coffee drink prepared by diluting an espresso with hot water, giving it a similar strength to, but different flavor from, traditionally brewed coffee.
